channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Exclusive: Suspected Chinese hackers impersonate U.S. briefings in phishing lure
item.description: A suspected China-based hacking group spun up a phishing campaign around Christmas that mimicked U.S. policy briefings in an attempt to hack diplomats...

item.title: Car insurance rates are falling — but not everywhere
item.description: Data: Insurify ; Map: Alex Fitzpatrick/Axios Car insurance prices dipped last year after a post-pandemic stretch of skyrocketing costs, a new Insurify...

item.title: Paris prosecutors raided X offices and summoned Musk as global crackdown on Grok intensifies
item.description: French prosecutors raided X's Paris offices Tuesday and summoned Elon Musk and former CEO Linda Yaccarino for voluntary questioning in a criminal prob...

item.title: Moltbook shows rapid demand for AI agents. The security world isn't ready.
item.description: The autonomous future stopped being theoretical this weekend, as a swarm of AI agents signed up for a social media network built just for them. Why it...

item.title: Exclusive: Sen. Maggie Hassan presses AI toy company on child data privacy
item.description: A Democratic senator is demanding answers from an AI toy company accused of exposing tens of thousands of children's private conversations, according ...

item.title: Clintons told to solidify plans for Epstein testimony or face renewed contempt vote
item.description: The House Oversight Committee chairman told the Clintons to confirm plans for depositions by Tuesday or the House would move forward with a contempt h...

item.title: Despite 3 million files, Epstein release leaves big questions unanswered
item.description: The members of Congress who wrote the law requiring disclosure of the files are still looking for explanations.

item.title: House GOP searches for votes to reopen government with razor-thin majority
item.description: House Democrats have indicated privately that they do not plan to support the plan, leaving Republicans to go it alone.

item.title: Federal officers in Minneapolis to start wearing body cams, DHS says
item.description: The decision to equip federal agents in Minneapolis with body cameras comes after federal agents in the metropolitan area shot and killed two people.

item.title: House to vote on reopening government, extending ICE funding
item.description: The deal would fund most of the government through September. But Congress would have only 10 days to fund the Department of Homeland Security.

item.title: Trump in Iowa tries to shift the conversation back to the economy
item.description: A brief swing through the farm state underscored administration fears about the midterms.

item.title: Americans give Trump low marks on handling of economy as midterms likely to center on affordability
item.description: Sixty-one percent of voters told a CNN poll released Friday that they disapprove of the way Trump is handling the economy.

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
